main event: A UFO sighting in St. Georges, Delaware on April 29, 1952, observed for approximately 10 seconds.
interesting points: The object was reported to be traveling at approximately 100 MPH and made two complete turns., The conclusion of the report stated the object was unidentifiable., Observers stated that the object had a 'fire tail', The object was visible to observers using field glasses for around 13 minutes., Initial speculation suggested it might be a weather balloon, but identification remained inconclusive.
witness description: Mrs. CMA, Mrs. CMA, and Mrs. CMA, members of the Flying Saucer Investigative Associates.
